Industrial Edition | January 6, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
Important Badger Meter Representative Satisfaction Survey In just a few weeks, our trade association, the Measurement, Control & Automation Association (MCAA) will be conducting an industry-wide customer satisfaction survey in which our company is participating. We hope you will look for this email and respond candidly. While we will NOT see your individual responses, the overall input will help us serve your company better. Your feedback is important to us. The survey will be sent from badgermeter@measure.org. Please clear that email address through your email filters so you can give us your input. If you have any questions, please contact Judson Luke.
